character_creation_steps: Theme & Origin: Choose your Theme and Origin.
Skills: Distribute 5 levels among your classes and choose skills.
Attributes: Assign dice (d6, d8, d10) to your four Attributes.
Stats: Calculate your HP, MP, IP, DEF, M.DEF, and Initiative.
Equipment: Purchase equipment with 500 Zenit + (2d6 x 10 Z).
Description: Define your character's appearance, name, and pronouns.
Fabula Points: Note your starting Fabula Points (3 FP).
Party: Introduce your character to the party.

class_rules.level_distribution: You must distribute 5 levels among your chosen classes.
class_rules.free_benefits: You gain the Free Benefits from a class only for the first level you take in that class.
class_rules.skill_level_requirement: To choose a Skill, your current level in that specific class must be equal to or higher than the Skill's SL requirement.

Loremaster.free_benefit: Permanently increase your maximum Mind Points by 5.

skills.name: Focused
skills.description: Once per scene, reroll a failed Attribute Check that doesn't use a Skill.

skills.name: Trained Memory
skills.description: Once per week, "flash back" to declare you prepared something, or reinvestigate a past scene.

skills.name: Knowledge is Power
skills.description: When you make an Accuracy Check, you may use your Insight or Willpower die size instead of Dexterity or Might.

skills.name: Quick Assessment
skills.description: At the start of a conflict, spend MP to ask the GM about enemy Traits or Affinities.

skills.name: Flash of Insight
skills.description: When you use a 3.S+ (Critical), you may ask the GM a "yes or no" question about the conflict or situation.

skills.name: Fears of Premonition
skills.description: Once per conflict, when an enemy is introduced, you may ask the GM about one of its Traits.

Wayfarer.free_benefit: Permanently increase your maximum Inventory Points by 2.

skills.name: Well-Traveled
skills.description: You reduce the die rolled for your travel rolls by one size (min. d6).

skills.name: Treasure Hunter
skills.description: When you travel, you make a discovery on a travel roll of SL + 1 or lower.

skills.name: Tavern Talk
skills.description: When you rest at a settlement, you may ask the GM SL "yes or no" questions about the location or a person of interest.

skills.name: Faithful Companion
skills.description: You gain a companion creature of your Level.

skills.name: Resourceful
skills.description: Once per day, you may search your belongings to "find" any non-magical item with a cost of 50 Z or less.
